Translations.Text: Alif, lom, ro. In ast ojathoikitoʙi ʙo hikmat

Ojo mardum dar taaccuʙand, az in ki ʙar marde az xudason vahj kardem, ki mardumro ʙitarson va mu'minonro xusxaʙar deh, ki dar nazdi Parvardigorason pojgohe ʙaland dorand? Kofiron guftand, ki in mard oskoro codugarest

Parvardigori sumo Olloh ast, ki osmonhovu zaminro dar sas ruz ʙijofarid; sipas ʙa ars pardoxt: korhoro tadʙir kard. Cuz ʙa ruxsati U safo'atkunandae naʙosad. In ast Olloh — Parvardigori sumo. Uro ʙiparasted! Caro pand namegired

Bozgasti hamai sumo ʙa Ust. In ʙarhaq va'dai Xudost. U maxluqotro ʙijofarinad. On goh ononro ʙa sui xud ʙozgardonad, to kasonero, ki imon ovarda va kori soista kardaand, az rui adl mukofot dihad. Va kofironro ʙa cazoi kufrason saroʙest az oʙi cusonu azoʙest dardovar

Ust on, ki xursedro ravsani ʙaxsidu mohro munavvar soxt va ʙarojas manozile mu'ajjan kard, to az sumori solho va hisoʙ ogoh saved. Xudo hamai inhoro cuz ʙa haq najofarid va ojotro ʙaroi mardume, ki medonand, ʙatafsil ʙajon mekunad
Dar omadusudi saʙu ruz va on ci Xudo dar osmonhovu zamin ofaridaast, ʙaroi parhezgoron iʙrathost
